pkgmetadata.longdescription: # RFC 1924This python library is an implementation of [RFC 1924](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc1924). ## A Compact Representation of IPv6 AddressesWith this library you can store IPv6 addresses in a more compact form. It's Base85 encoded.## Usage```pyfrom rfc1924 import *print(encode("2345:0425:2CA1::0567:5673:23b5")) # -> AN?6(i3Y+yVr74uX@J3Pprint(decode("AN?6(i3Y+yVr74uX@J3P")) # -> 2345:0425:2CA1::0567:5673:23b5```Save up to 48% space with this compact form:`ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff` -> `=r54lj&NUUO~Hi%c2ym0`
